snippet: Stocks and the euro fell after the leading party in the Greek Parliament was unable to form a government.
abstract: Stocks decline in the United States and Europe after the leading party in the Greek Parliament is unable to form a government, adding to fears that an anti-austerity outcry is leading the Continent back into turmoil.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and DAVID JOLLY

lead_paragraph: Stocks and the euro fell after the leading party in the Greek Parliament was unable to form a government.

headline.seo: Stocks Slip on Worries About Euro Crisis and Greece
headline.print_headline: Worries About the Euro Crisis and Greece Weigh on Wall Street
